channel.title: Podventures on Harold's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Podventures on Harold's Blog

item.author: xiangaoole@gmail.com (Harold Gao)
item.description: Release Notes v1.0.1 Version Features: Search Functionality: Quickly find episodes by title and description with highlighted keywords, making discovery efficient. Listening List: Queue up your next episodes and auto-download them within your set limit for seamless listening. Listening History: Easily track and revisit episodes you’ve played, organized by recent listening activity. Show Notes Display: Access detailed episode notes beautifully presented for deeper insights. Episode Filtering: Customize your view with filters for played, downloaded, or all episodes, and sort by release date or duration for a tailored experience.
